item.title: After recent accident with E-bike, 11th September
item.description:
After the recent accident of a 6yesr old girl being hit by an E-bike I find it even more important to adress the issue of the road between park and playground . There need to be speed bumps and some sort of restriction so bikes do not speed past playgroun
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Caldecott Way, Hackney, London

item.title: The 5 litter bins are full and overflowing once again, 11th September
item.description:

item.title: Household furniture and bags of waste, 11th September
item.description:

item.title: Dog fouling on pavements, 11th September
item.description:
I have noticed that for 3 consecutive nights , someone is allowing their dog to foul in front of my house pavement without cleaning it . Every day morning I wake up and see new dog poo . This has happened in the week starting 3/9/2025.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kelbrook Road, Well Hall, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned and untaxed smashed up car on dunstall welling estate, 11th September
item.description:
There is a dumped silver honda civic at 1 dunstall welling estate, this has been there since yesterday morning, has no tax or MOT on it and all windows have been smashed in and all inside has been ruined. please can this be looked into and can it be removed asap, thank-you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Unit 1, Leigh Place, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Public tree roots uplifting pavement on private walkway, 11th September
item.description:
A very large (established tree c.100 years old) has lifted up the paving stones outside my property on Tremaine Road. It's gradually worsened over the last 10 years from a small crack to a large 'step-like drop' with large crack. Can someone please assist with next steps to remedy?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tremaine Road, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There is a safety issue at these traffic lights. Traffic is released too early under green traffic light in conflict with traffic still turning right from Sidcup Road A20. Traffic from Southwood Road has to brake suddenly to avoid collisions from the traffic at right angles from Sidcup Road A20., 11th September
item.description:
There is a safety issue at these traffic lights. Traffic is released too early under green traffic light in conflict with traffic still turning right from Sidcup Road A20. Traffic from Southwood Road has to brake suddenly to avoid collisions from the traffic at right angles from Sidcup Road A20.

item.description:
